jobInfo.postDescription:
Summary & Role information:
Collaborate with all development process contributors, e.g. Product Owner, Architect, Project Management, Scrum Master, peer Developers.
Understand/question requirements, do quick analysis, and contribute own ideas.
Write/maintain high quality, robust and testable code.
Analyze and solve (complex) issues in existing and new code.
Apply Agile Software Engineering principles for continuous delivery.
Develop test strategy, test plan, test cases, and roadmap.
Take responsibility for monitoring product development and testing at all levels with an eye toward improving product quality.
Drive initiatives for automated testing strategies, code health, data analysis, and improve testability of our products.
Collaborate with colleagues on designing pre-submit, post-submit, continuous testing, and release testing, covering functionality, stability, and performance

2-4 years’ experience on Quality Engineer
Experience in Git, GitHub, pipeline etc.
Experience in automation test e.g. unit test, API test, UI test
Experience in SAP system/UI5 is a plus
Experience with test-driven development, continuous integration & delivery is a plus。
Scrum experience is a plus
Good level of written English (good verbal English is a plus)


备注：外包岗位，介意请勿投递，外企机会，长期稳定且没有加班情况。

brandComInfo.introduce:
SAP公司成立于1972年，总部位于德国沃尔多夫市，是全球最大的企业管理和协同化商务解决方案供应商。目前，在全球有120多个国家的超过172,000家用户正在运行SAP软件。财富500强80%以上的企业都正在从SAP的管理方案中获益。SAP在全球75多个国家拥有分支机构，并在多家证券交易所上市，包括法兰克福和纽约证交所。
1995年在北京正式成立SAP中国公司，已在大中国区10多个城市设有办事机构。作为企业应用软件解决方案的绝对领导者，SAP的市场份额和年度业绩近年来高速增长。SAP在中国有11000多家客户，拥有包括IBM、埃森哲、凯捷、HP、毕博、德勤、石化盈科、中电普华、东软、神州数码等多家合作伙伴。
我们的使命是助力客户实现卓越运营。我们的愿景是帮助人们提高生活品质，让世界变得更美好。
